title: Wandering Eye Fish
summaries: The Wandering Eye Fish is an enemy that can be spawned by fishing in a Blood Moon. When the bobber dips and the player attempts to reel in a fish, a Wandering Eye Fish or a Zombie Merman has a chance to spawn within a few blocks of the bobber in place of the Wandering Eye Fish. In Hardmode, a Hemogoblin Shark or Blood Eel has a chance to spawn within a few blocks of the bobber in place of the Wandering Eye Fish.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.

statistics.Damage: 35/70/105
statistics.Max Life: 300/600/900
statistics.Banner: [img:Wandering Eye Fish Banner]Wandering Eye Fish Banner
